title: Deshaun Watson's value; Von Miller to Bills; Biggest threat in AFC West; March Madness
itunes:title: Deshaun Watson's value; Von Miller to Bills; Biggest threat in AFC West; March Madness
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Kyle Brandt and Super Bowl champion Shaun O'Hara explore how much value Deshaun Watson would bring to the Saints, Panthers, Browns and Falcons if he were traded to any of those teams. Then they share their thoughts on how far the Buffalo Bills can go after the addition of Von Miller; they give their insights on the biggest threat to the Chiefs in the loaded AFC West which now has Khalil Mack, Chandler Jones and Russell Wilson; and they finish up with a March Madness segment of their own.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
